articles.title: Namaz row: FIR against those who offered prayers inside Lucknow's Lulu Mall
articles.description: The mall was inaugurated by chief minister Yogi Adityanath on July 10. Within days of opening, it ran into controversy after some persons reportedly offered namaz in an open space in the shopping arena of the mall.
